    A class used to generate random values.

      • getRandomUsingWeights

        public static java.lang.Integer getRandomUsingWeights​(double[] weights)
        Generates a random integer using the weights. Indexes with a larger value weight will be more likely to be chosen by the algorithm.
        Parameters:
        weights - The list of weights.
        Returns:
        A random index within the bounds of the list.
